author: kemperwilkins
title: NYC Big East Basketball Tournament 2017.
text: We received excellent service beginning with our booking day with Jenna to our checkout day. Friendly and courteous service our entire stay. We will definitely be back next year. We had a great stay with great staff at a great hotel, The Stewart, NYC
